import {isFunction,isString,uniqueId} from "lodash";
 
import React from "react";
 
import {cx,css} from "emotion";
 
 
import Input from "./input";
import SelectInput from "./select-input";
import mergeProps from "../utils/merge-props";
import getChildren from "../utils/children";
import {Checkbox,Toggle,Slider} from "./checkbox";
import {CornerLabel as Corner, Label} from "./label";
 
import getFieldStyle from "../styles/form/form-field.style";
 
 
 
const inputMappings = {
  // select:Select,
  checkbox: Checkbox,
  toggle: Toggle,
  slider: Slider
};
 
const helpTextStyle = css`
  font-size:0.7em;
  color:#999;
  padding:0.2em;
  text-align:right;
`;
 
export default class Field extends React.Component {
 
  constructor() {
    super();
    this.state = {inputID: uniqueId("formField_")};
  }
 
  onChange = (ev,name,value)=>{
 
    if (this.props.onChange) {
      if (!name) {
        name = ev.target && ev.target.name;
      }
      if (value === undefined) {
        value = ev.target && ev.target.value;
      }
      this.props.onChange(ev,name,value);
    }
 
  }
 
  onFocus = ()=>{
    this.setState({focus: true});
  }
 
  onBlur = ()=>{
    this.setState({focus: false});
  }
 
  render() {
 
    const {
      id: _id,
      type: _type,
      icon: _icon,
      options: _options,
      disabled: _disabled,
      help: _help,
      label: _label,
      placeholder: _placeholder,
      inputProps: _inputProps,
 
      labelProps: _labelProps,
      hideLabel,
      optionsContext,
      maxChars,
      value,
      required,
      excludeRequiredMarker,
      validation,
      defaultValue,
      style,
      className,
      classSet,
      name,
      maxLength,
 
    } = this.props;
 
    let label = null;
    const state = this.state;
    const id = _id || state.inputID;
    let type = _type || "text";
    const icon = _icon || type.defaultIcon;
    const options = isFunction(_options) ? _options.call(optionsContext || this.props) : _options;
    const disabled = _disabled || (options && options.length === 0);
    
    let validationMessage;
    let inputProps = {};
    
    let inputChildren = getChildren(this);
 
    let help = _help;
 
    const styleFlags = { 
      disabled,
    };
 
 
    if (help == null && maxChars) {
      Iif (value) {
        help = `${value.length} of ${maxChars} chars`;
      }
      else {
        help = `max ${maxChars} characters`;
      }
    }
 
    
 
    if (_label && !hideLabel) {
      const labelProps = mergeProps({
        htmlFor: id
      },_labelProps);
      // eslint-disable-next-line jsx-a11y/label-has-associated-control,jsx-a11y/label-has-for
      label = <label {...labelProps}>{_label}</label>;
    }
 
    if (required && !inputChildren.length && !excludeRequiredMarker) {
      inputChildren = [<Corner icon="asterisk" key="requiredAsterisk" />,<input key="input" />];
    }
 
    if (validation && !validation.valid && !state.focus) {
 
      styleFlags.error = true;
      
      const validationText = isString(validation) ? validation : validation.text;
      Eif (validationText) {
        validationMessage = (
          <Label variation="negative" pointing="up">
            {validationText}
          </Label>
        );
      }
    }
 
    let placeholder = _placeholder;
 
    if (placeholder == null) {
      placeholder = (type === "select") ? "-- Please Select --" : (type && type.defaultPlaceholder);
    }
 
    console.log("_inputProps",_inputProps)
 
    inputProps = mergeProps({
      id,
      placeholder,
      value,
      defaultValue,
      onChange: this.onChange,
      name,
      onFocus: this.onFocus,
      onBlur: this.onBlur,
      disabled,
      maxLength: maxLength || maxChars,
      options,
      label: _label,
      icon,
      type,
      fluid: true,
    },inputProps,_inputProps);
 
    console.log("inputProps", inputProps)
 
    Eif (!inputProps.component) {
      if (type === "select") {
        type = SelectInput;
      }
    }
    
    const inputComponent = isString(type) ? inputMappings[type] || Input : type;
    const {isCheckbox} = inputComponent;
 
    styleFlags.inline = type.isCheckbox;
 
 
    if (help) {
      help = <div className={cx("cm-helptext", helpTextStyle)}>{help}</div>;
    }
 
    
    const input = React.createElement(inputComponent,inputProps,inputChildren);
 
    const newProps = mergeProps({
      className: cx("cm-field",getFieldStyle(styleFlags),className),
      key: name,
    },{
      classSet,
      style,
    });
 
    return (
      <div {...newProps}>
        {!isCheckbox && label}
        {input}
        {help}
        {validationMessage}
      </div>
    );
  }
}
